name: UITextDragDelegate
desc: The interface for customizing the behavior of a drag activity for a text view.

items.name: func textDraggableView(UIView & UITextDraggable, dragSessionWillBegin: UIDragSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the text has been lifted out of the text view and the user is beginning to drag the text.

items.name: func textDraggableView(UIView & UITextDraggable, dragSessionDidEnd: UIDragSession, with: UIDropOperation)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the drag session has ended.

items.name: func textDraggableView(UIView & UITextDraggable, willAnimateLiftWith: UIDragAnimating, session: UIDragSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the lift animation is about to begin, and gives you a chance to animate additional changes alongside the system animation.

items.name: func textDraggableView(UIView & UITextDraggable, itemsForDrag: UITextDragRequest) -> [UIDragItem]
items.desc: Asks the delegate for custom drag items from a text view.

items.name: func textDraggableView(UIView & UITextDraggable, dragPreviewForLiftingItem: UIDragItem, session: UIDragSession) -> UITargetedDragPreview?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the preview to show during the lift animation that happens when a user begins to drag an item from a text view.
